text: Robert Earle Clarke (born August 13, 1949), also known as Bob Clarke (since retirement as a player) and Bobby Clarke (while active as a player), is a Canadian former professional ice hockey centre who played his entire 15-year National Hockey League (NHL) career with the Philadelphia Flyers and is currently an executive with the team. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Bobby Clarke, winner of the Lionel Conacher Award and the Bobbie Rosenfeld Award: Virtual Museum of Canada Exhibit Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Bill Masterton Memorial Trophy winners Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Flin Flon Bombers players Category:Hart Memorial Trophy winners Category:Hockey Hall of Fame inductees Category:Ice hockey people from Manitoba Category:Philadelphia Flyers players Category:Stanley Cup champions
title: Bobby Clarke
